client_description_Summary_Note:
Garcia Martin Moreau and the RM crossed paths at a tech conference in Paris. They attended several keynote sessions together and realized they had a shared vision for the future of technology investments.
Garcia Martin Moreau is a 23 year old and comes from France.
He was impressed by Julius Baer's global presence and expertise in private banking, leading to the decision to join.
client_description_Family_Background: Garcia Martin Moreau is currently single. He does not have any children.
client_description_Education_Background:
Garcia completed his secondary education at Lycée Victor Hugo in 2021.
Garcia pursued higher education at EMIC de Nice, graduating in 2024.
client_description_Occupation_History:
Garcia Martin Moreau is a 23 year old and comes from France.
Garcia Martin Moreau did not start his professional career yet.
client_description_Wealth_Summary:
He did not manage to save any money during his career.
Client does not have any properties.He inherited a significant sum of 1150000 EUR from his grandmother, a respected Investment Banker, in 2019, which he has wisely invested.
client_description_Client_Summary: The RM is committed to helping Garcia achieve financial success and security as he embarks on his professional journey.
